mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO soso.letter( userId, letterContent, letterFont, letterFontColor, letterPaper, letterWriter, letterIcon, letterFontSize, letterTextAlign, letterWriteDate,letterReadYn, letterDelYn) VALUES (#{userId}, #{letterContent}, #{letterFont}, #{letterFontColor}, #{letterPaper}, #{letterWriter}, #{letterIcon}, #{letterFontSize}, #{letterTextAlign}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{letterReadYn}, #{letterDelYn})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO soso.STICKER(letterId, stickerIcon, stickerX, stickerY) VALUES (#{letterId}, #{stickerIcon}, #{stickerX}, #{stickerY})
mapper.select: SELECT userOpenDate FROM soso.member WHERE userid = #{userid}

SELECT l.letterId, l.userId, l.letterContent, l.letterFont, l.letterFontColor, l.letterPaper, l.letterWriter, letterFontSize, letterTextAlign, l.letterIcon, l.letterWriteDate, l.letterReadYn, l.letterDelYn from soso.letter l LEFT JOIN soso.member m ON l.userId = m.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} AND
l.letterWriteDate > m.userOpenDate AND
(m.userOpenDate + 8640000) > l.letterWriteDate
